text: Nina Antonovna Bocharova (, September 24, 1924 - August 31, 2020) was a Soviet-Ukrainian gymnast. He won four medals at the 1952 Summer Olympics, two gold and silver. She was born in Suprunivka, Poltava Oblast, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. Bocharova died on August 31, 2020 in Rome, aged 95.Тяжка втрата: відійшла у вічність легенда українського спорту ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Ukrainian sportspeople Category:People from Poltava Oblast Category:Gymnasts
title: Nina Bocharova
